result.html: Ar aimsigh tú an áitDid you find the place?
result.ponchtml: Ar aimsiġ tú an áitDid you find the place?

result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.
result.ga: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.orig: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.html: Beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.
result.ponchtml: Beag an baol go n-aimseoiḋ sí rud ar biṫ ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: How did you find the place?
result.ga: Conas a d'aimsigh tú an áit
result.orig: Conas a d'aimsigh tú an áit
result.html: Conas a d'aimsigh tú an áitHow did you find the place?
result.ponchtml: Conas a d'aimsiġ tú an áitHow did you find the place?

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.html: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tú clár na n-áḃar ag tús an leaḃairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.

result.eng: I am unable to find work.
result.ga: Níl mé in ann post a fháil
result.orig: Níl mé in ann post a fháil
result.html: Níl mé in ann post a fháilI am unable to find work.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé in ann post a ḟáilI am unable to find work.

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: Ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu

result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
